  physical_appearance: This is a graphic drawing. It is a graphic work listing the names of places in capital letters in black
 in various sizes and alignments. Each place name has two faint margin lines at the top and bottom of the word.There are no tears or folds seen on the drawing.

  sgcool_label_text: A graphic drawing listing names of places such as Kuala Lumpur
 Luang
 Sembawang
 Sungi best
 Malaya etc by P.O.W R H Bailey of the Royal Air Force. It is presumed that the places listed relate to his experience of the War. This artefact is part of the archive of James Steele
 Royal Artillery (Field) who served in Malaya from January 1941-February 1942
 when interned as a P.O.W at Changi until his release in October 1945.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a graphic drawing. It is a graphic work listing the names of places in capital letters in black, in various sizes and alignments. Each place name has two faint margin lines at the top and bottom of the word.There are no tears or folds seen on the drawing.
metadata.subject_terms_2: World War, 1939-1945 Prisoners of war Drawing Singapore Malaya
metadata.context_7: Great Britain. Army. Royal Field Artillery
metadata.sgcool_label_text: A graphic drawing listing names of places such as Kuala Lumpur, Luang, Sembawang, Sungi best, Malaya etc by P.O.W R H Bailey of the Royal Air Force. It is presumed that the places listed relate to his experience of the War. This artefact is part of the archive of James Steele, Royal Artillery (Field) who served in Malaya from January 1941-February 1942, when interned as a P.O.W at Changi until his release in October 1945.
